channel.title: Anyone here that play arena shooters?
channel.description:
[Why arena shooters are great, for anyone not in the know.](https://youtu.be/owpHC4Pg550)
I personally do wish that the new Black Mesa deathmatch would be more like HL1DM, so that it could bring in the AFPS crowd.

item.title: Anyone here that play arena shooters?
item.dc:creator: drgibbles
item.description:
I do. Still sad about Quake Champions. I have found memories of playing hl1dm. when servers were packed and boot camp was full. The routes you develop while running that maps, like Datacore, go for the m203 rounds, jump jets, shotgun was a 2 shell monster insta kill. Stalkyard was fav though. And how great were tripmines?!

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone here that play arena shooters?
